job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Job Title : Software Engineer C++Location: Salt Lake City , UTJob Type: Contract   Job Description&nbsp;Software Engineer -C++ Linux . Experience in Python, Shell scripting. Nice to have experience in Java, GWT, and QT.&nbsp;   Roles & Responsibilities:&nbsp;Participate in requirement analysis, design, coding, and testing (manual as well as automation)&nbsp;Ability to understand/learn architecture and design of existing applications developed mainly using C++&nbsp;Take ownership of assigned jobs that are part of new feature implementation, bugfixes and enhancement activities&nbsp;Technical communication with internal/external stake holders and collaboration with global team will be part of job.&nbsp;   Required Skills (Technical Competency):&nbsp;3-5 years of experience in design and development of C++ software applications and frameworks in Windows /Linux.&nbsp;Experience in requirement analysis, design development, coding, code review and unit testing.&nbsp;Hands on software development experience – strong C++ programming skills.&nbsp;Experience in Object Oriented design and multi-threading methodologies.&nbsp;Experience analysing, debugging issues with multi-threaded process using debugger&nbsp;Ability to write effective and reusable code according to best practices&nbsp;Experience inworking with Agile methodology in project execution&nbsp;   Desired Skills:&nbsp;Experience in Python, Shell scripting.&nbsp;Nice to have experience in Java, GWT, and QT.&nbsp;Familiar with Healthcare domain standard like DICOM and IHE.&nbsp;Ability to explore large code base and understand architecture and design&nbsp;Ability to deliver without much supervision from lead/managers&nbsp;Familiar with tools like WinSCP, Eclipse, Putty, Rally, Collaborator, SVN, Git&nbsp;   If you are interested kindly apply through the below link:https://bit.ly/3wCDEba   Recruiter Details:Mohamed sheik(302) 310-5458sheikmd_us@falconsmartit.com   Find all current job openings at our Career Pagehttps://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html   Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunitieshttps://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
